import React, { Component } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const url = `http://localhost:3001/users ` export default class View extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { } } render() { console.log(this.props.match.params.userid) var { userid , id , name , mail , phone } = this.state return (<>

User_View_Data

{this.props.match.params.userid} th Record Data

  • {userid}
  • {id}
  • {name}
  • {mail}
  • {phone}
GoTo Back
) } componentDidMount() { axios.get(`url/`).then((record) => this.setState(record.data)) //Update apidata to empty state object via setState } }
